content.rendered:
Directed by Anjali Menon.

Written by Sachin Kundalkar. Anjali Menon. Anjali Menon. Anjali Menon.

Cast Prithviraj Sukumaran(Joshua Thomas). Parvathy Thiruvothu(Sophie (as Parvathy)). Darshana Rajendran(Alina). Nazriya Nazim(Jennifer Maria Thomas aka Jenny). Atul Kulkarni(Asharaf). Roshan Mathew(Krishna). Nilambur Ayisha(Grandmother). Maala Parvathi(Lilly (as Parvathi T.)). Ranjith(Aloshy (as Renjith)). Siddharth Menon(Sean). Sajitha Madathil(Badri). Jolly Chirayath(Doctor). Nandu Poduval(Villager). Santhosh Keezhattoor(Darius). Joy Badlani(Bhadran). Shambhu Menon(Arjun). Aravind SK((as Aravind Sk)). Devan(Ouseppahan). Pauly Valsan(Kochuthresiamma (as Pouly Valsan)). Vinod Kovoor(Khader). Prashant Nair(Supervisor / Engineer). Krishnakumar Menon(Doctor). Basil(Christy). Prajwal Prasad(Benjamin). Franco Davis Manjila(Aloshy’s Friend). Sarath Chandran(Febin). G.R. Rajan(Thommichan). Baby Mira(Jenny jr). Sivakumar Sopanam(Fr. Immanuel)

Language Malayalam.

Producers Anjali Menon. Mini Purushot. M. Renjith. Vinod Unnithan.

Production Little Films. Rejaputhra Visual Media.
